gov.nih.nlm.meme.exception
Class MEMEException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          gov.nih.nlm.meme.exception.MEMEException
All Implemented Interfaces:
MEMEConstants, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorException, ApplicationException, ClientException, DeveloperException, ExternalResourceException, InitializationException
public class MEMEException
extends Exception
implements MEMEConstants

This is a wrapper around Exception which is the base class for the MEME exception architecture. It provides useful methods for obtaining more information about the nature of the actual problem.

Author:
MEME Group
See Also:
Serialized Form

public MEMEException()
Instantiates an empty MEMEException.

MEMEException

public MEMEException(String message)
Instantiates a MEMEException with the specified message and a null source. Makes use of MEMEException(String,Object).

Parameters:
message - the error message

MEMEException

public MEMEException(String message,
                     Object source)
Instantiates a MEMEException with the specified message and specified source. Makes use of Exception.

Parameters:
message - the error message
source - the Object that caused this exception

printStackTrace

public void printStackTrace(PrintWriter log)
Print the stack trace to the specified PrintWriter if setPrintStackTrace(true) has beencalled. Recursively print stack trace for all enclosed exceptions.

Parameters:
log - the PrintWriter log
